function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of ineffective air filters","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission and poor air quality","Mitigation":"Ensure the use of high-efficiency HEPA filters to effectively trap and remove viruses","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV light, air purification systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in the event of a pandemic","Owner":"Building management, facility managers"},{"Description":"Improper installation of air filters","Impact":"Leakage of contaminated air and decreased filtration efficiency","Mitigation":"Ensure proper installation of air filters with appropriate mounting frames and sealing to prevent air leakage","Technologies":"Advanced mounting frames, sealing materials, air flow testing","People":"HVAC technicians, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, HVAC contractors"},{"Description":"Inadequate maintenance of air filters","Impact":"Decreased filtration efficiency, buildup of contaminants, and increased risk of viral transmission","Mitigation":"Implement regular maintenance schedules to clean or replace air filters as recommended by manufacturers","Technologies":"Filter replacement schedules, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Maintenance staff, building management","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"}]}
